experiences.title: Software Engineer
experiences.description: Developing and maintaining scalable cloud-native web applications with modern architectures. Focused on serverless solutions, API integrations, and workflow automation using AWS services.
achievements: Built and deployed microservices using AWS Lambda, API Gateway, and DynamoDB.
Improved performance and reduced cloud costs by implementing event-driven systems.
Developed internal developer tools for automation and testing pipelines using YAML workflows.
Integrated Python-based backend services with React and AWS Lambda for seamless API orchestration.

experiences.title: MEAN Stack Developer Trainee
experiences.description: Worked as a MEAN Stack Developer Trainee at Brototype. Learned and implemented the basics of MongoDB, Express.js, Angular, and Node.js. Also learned about the basics of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
achievements: Learned and implemented the basics of MongoDB, Express.js, Angular, and Node.js.
Learned and implemented the basics of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Learned and implemented the basics of Angular, Node.js, and MongoDB.
